case.state: I'm Catria. I bring friend's greetings. That's not why I'm playing a game like this, though.
I've been sent here on an errand by a friend. You know, just to play a few rounds!
I'm Catria, the middle of the three sisters in Macedonia's Whitewings. I serve Princess Minerva.
I'm Catria from Macedonia. Macedonian fliers are divided into the pegasus Whitewings and the wyvern Dragoons. I'm a Whitewing.
I'm Catria of the Whitewings. These clothes... They're part of my mission. Just... try to ignore them.
I'm Catria of the Whitewings. Please don't ask why I'm dressed like this...
My sisters, Palla and Est, tell me I was made for these kinds of games, but I don't play cards that often...
This is a strange location for a poker game, by the way. This isn't illegal gambling, is it?
I've been sent here on an errand by a friend. You know, just to say hi!
My sisters, Palla and Est, said I was just cut out for such games. But I don't play cards that often...
That vulgar lady over there makes me nervous. Is she an archer?
That woman with the hat over there makes me nervous. Is she an archer? Or even... a sniper?
You said your name was Estelle? And you have the same hair color as well... what a coincidence.
That girl over there looks familiar... Isn't she a Pegasus Knight as well?
Look at that! I never thought I'd meet another Pegasus Knight here.
You know me? Could it be that we met in Askr? Are you a Pegasus knight as well, Florina?
Where have I seen this green-haired lady before? ...Must have been in Askr. But was there a priestess like her?
D-does that blonde woman over there have a ranged weapon? I need to take cover!
P-Prince Marth!? I-is that really you? I didn't know your Majesty was coming here as well...!
Aren't you Lady Lyndis? It's nice to see a familiar face around here.
Oh, that is you, Lady Lyndis! For a second, I thought you were Palla. You do look similar from behind...
That woman over there has wings. Is she a manakete? No, she looks more like a wyvern...
Is this winged ball of light a player? How can it even hold its cards?
Are those pegasus wings on that boy's back!?
Hey that's Corrin! I saw him when I was summoned to Askr.
What is Corrin doing here? Did that wyvern princess force him to come here?
Is that you, Corrin? And is this girl who looks like you your sister?
I never knew you had a twin sister, Corrin... who's also named Corrin? How confusing...
Sometimes a hero gets summoned twice to Askr. But can you link up as different genders as well?
You're Corrin, aren't you? We met in Askr. But why did you let your hair grow? You look a little girlish like that.
Those clothes, that hair color... This is definitely Corrin. But he's acting very feminine today...
This feeling... My experience as a Pegasus Knight is telling me that there's a ranged weapon nearby. I don't see any bows, though...?
That girl over there has the same aura as the mages in the Altean army... How good was my magical resistance again?
That girl over there has the same aura as the mages in the Altean army... How good was my magical resistance again?
How did I end up in this outfit? This isn't good...
Hoppity-hop! Is that really what rabbits say? Or did my sisters mean something else by "Go and do it like rabbits"...?
Let's see... I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
I need ~cards~ new cards, please!
What I would take off first? I can think about that later.
You shouldn't underestimate me just because I didn't know about the stripping part.
There are queens and kings but what about this 'J' card? It's no prince, is it? The princes I know are much more handsome than that...
Ha ha! Seems today's my lucky day.
Hard to keep up my poker face, these cards are too good!
Times like this are what I really need to focus on.
Great! Just the card I needed!
I want to be happy about my good hand, but this woman makes me nervous...
We have you now! Triangle Attack!!!
That looks better than expected. I might even end this game without undressing once.
Nice start! I might even win the first round.
All's well here.
Let's see if my training was good enough.
Okay, I have... then ~player~ might have...
I'm still doing fine.
Have you ever wondered about this cross symbol on these cards? Is this some kind of ancient family emblem?
Have you ever noticed the spade symbol looks like a spearhead?
Easy now...
Here we go!
That woman makes me nervous. I nearly exchanged the wrong card...
Seems like I'm not that bad at all. I wonder why I'm always the first one out when I'm playing with my sisters..?
Okay, I'm ready. When do we set the Blinds?
Doesn't the diamond symbol on the cards imply we should be playing for money or something instead? I'm just asking...
My little sister once said I should form this shape on the cards with my hands when I'm nervous in front of strangers. It would bring me new friends. Does anyone know what that means?
Mnn... Maybe I should...
What would the commander do in this situation..?
Mnnn...
Keep cool, Catria! You have some dispensable clothes on you. You can afford to lose the round...
Looks like I should start thinking what to take off first...
That woman got me distracted... I've exchanged the wrong card.
So my luck is finally running out, huh?
I'd like to fold. Huh? I can't?
You can summon flowers? Does this even count as clothes?
Is this really the same Corrin I have met in Askr? He looks way more fragile.
By the way Corrin: Have you stopped training since we saw the last time in Askr?
Wait, Florina! You said you landed on someone? If it wasn't one of us, this person might still be beneath your pegasus...
You crash-landed with your pegasus, Florina? You're quite clumsy, aren't you?
Say, Florina, that "Huey" you mentioned... Is that the pegasus outside? I can tell you've taken good care of him.
I-is it okay if I take cover over there? Pegasus Knights don't like ranged weapons...
Er, I hope I'm not being rude, but... why are you wearing that mask, Prince Marth?
So, er... Why were you disguised as Prince Marth anyway? You should have told me, Lucina!
Er, i-it's me, Catria... From the White Wings. We fought alongside each other when... You couldn't possibly have forgotten me... Could you?
If only Prince Marth were here to protect me...
Y-you're a fan of mine, Florina? I'm truly honored, but... are you sure you're not confusing me with somebody else?
Oh, don't worry, I've seen dozens of Pegasus Knights like that before. And is there a reason why you wanted to meet me?
I wish I knew, Lady L'Arachel... But now that I'm here, I guess I have to strip, right?
You want me to... wait, this is strip poker!? I'm playing strip poker with Prince Marth!?
Oh, I lost! What a shame... (It's about time!)
What!? You expect me to... Wait! This is strip poker!?
It was a little too optimistic to believe I'd end this game without undressing, wasn't it?
Must I really do this?
Ah! How embarrassing â€” you caught me daydreaming!
Who has the worst hand? ...You're looking at me aren't you?
What!? Why does no-one have a worse hand than me?
What have I done to deserve this? I've always been a good girl...
Me? Why? Your hand looked much worse from the backside...
Isn't this a little bit unfair? I haven't even undressed once and yet you all have more clothes on than me.
These belts are the only rational choice now. But I can't carry my sword like this anymore...
I think I can part with my sword. I won't be attacked here, will I? ...Better keep it close.
Seems like I'm a victim of my sisters' scheming... It's not the first time they've tricked me into something like this.
C-come on, Florina, you're flattering me...
Jura started with her sword, and so will I.
I-is it okay to start with my sword, Prince Marth? Just say the word and I'll strip something else. (Or everything!)
(Take a deep breath, Catria! You know this is the situation you always dreamed of, but don't get too overexcited!)
You don't know what pegasi are, Meia? Well, they're not a kind of ship at all. Pegasi are winged horses that can fly through the air.
P-Prince Marth talked about m-me? Are you sure?
Please don't call me legendary just because I fought alongside Prince Marth, Rinkah. I'm just a normal girl stripping her belt and sword.
Just let me think... Yes! My belt. I won't be able to carry my sword anymore, but that's okay.
Finally I can take off these ridiculous bunny ears...
Okay... I'm kinda shocked at this, but if it means I can take off these ridiculous ears, I'm fine with it.
Are your cards really that bad, ~player~?
Curious... What is this feeling? Schadenfreude?
Don't look at me, ~player~. It's not my fault. Why do you stare at me like that?
Sorry, ~player~! I couldn't resist with this hand.
What's wrong, ~player~? Why are you fiddling with your clothing? Are you too hot?
Who won? Huh? Only the worst hand matters?
Another distraction?
Is it okay to play a game like this with the opposite sex?
Would it help if I turned around? At least I could relax a bit.
Oh! You've... lost?
I don't need to see ~name~'s cards. His loss is written all over his face.
Oh... I didn't expect that.
Sorry, ~name~! I couldn't resist with this hand.
Er, I'm still confused. Who has to strip this time?
Be a man! ...Or a woman? I don't know anymore...
Corrin has lost... Which one?
Corrin has lost? But these cards aren't that bad at all. ...Oh, you've meant the other one.
You've lost me. But as long the right Corrin strips, I'm okay.
Can't we just rename one of them to make it less confusing? I don't know why but "Kamui" would fit, don't you think?
I don't know why, but Corrin seems to be different than usual.
Come on, Corrin! You weren't that whiny when we fought alongside in Askr.
Seems like Corrin and I have one thing in common. We're both under the control of a sadistic wyvern princess.
I never knew Corrin was so delicately strung. It must be hard for him to hide his real feelings on the battlefield.
I know this is completely different too fighting foes on the battlefield, but try to bear this, Corrin. I'm doing the same.
Stop making that face, Corrin! You're making me feel guilty...
P-Prince Marth has to strip!? W-what should I do now?
Prince Marth has to... W-we're playing strip poker!? With Prince Marth!? I'm dreaming, right? Can somebody pinch me?
The boy with the pegasus wings is going to strip?
Your wings are no accessory, are they?
You're going to strip, pegasus boy?
What's wrong, ~name~? Why are you fiddling with your clothing? Are you too hot?
Who won? Huh? Only the worst hand matters?
Are your cards really that bad, ~player~?
Curious... What is this feeling? Schadenfreude?
Allies help one another. Now's your turn.
Sorry, ~player~! I couldn't resist with this hand.
What's wrong, ~player~? Why are you fiddling with your clothing? Are you too hot?
Who won? Huh? Only the worst hand matters?
I... I have a lot of respect for you.
Oh! You've... lost?
You're really going to strip, aren't you? I won't stop you...
I don't need to see ~name~'s cards. Her loss is written all over her face.
Reminds me of playing this with Princess Minerva and the others.
You're going to strip, ~name~?
Don't worry, ~name~! I'll even look in a different direction.
Come to think of it... Those tights, those bulges on the upper body...
You're not good with men, are you? Maybe you should have come to Princess Minerva's poker nights. These are always girls only.
Don't worry! I've seen naked princesses before. Even though I'd prefer a certain prince...
Princess Minerva, Princess Caeda, Princess ~name~... Do all princesses do this stuff?
Reminds me of playing this with Princess Minerva and the others...
Don't worry, Your Highness! I'll even look in a different direction!
I wish I were a princess too. Maybe he would give me more attention this way...
Sorry, ~name~! I couldn't resist with this hand.
S-She's firing! Take cover! Children and flying units first!
My Pegasus Knight senses were correct! She's a sniper!
I should have asked Princess Minerva for Iote's Shield! I'm under fire!
Hit a pegasus!?
Be a man, Corrin! ...Wait, she's a girl! I'll never get used to this...
Corrin is going to... Oh, right, he's a girl now...
I'm curious how different you are to the Corrin I know...
Let's see if there are any more secrets to reveal...
Er, I'm still confused. Who has to strip this time?
Be a man! ...Or a woman? I don't know anymore...
Corrin has lost... Which one?
Corrin has lost? But these cards aren't that bad at all. ...Oh, you've meant the other one.
You've lost me. But as long the right Corrin strips, I'm okay.
Can't we just rename one of them to make it less confusing? I don't know why but "Kamui" would fit, don't you think?
I could never tell which Corrin has lost by looking into their faces...
Show us how brave a Pegasus Knight can be, Florina!
You don't look well, Florina. Are you a sore loser?
Something the matter, Florina? You didn't gamble away your pegasus, did you?
I'm sorry, Florina... But I don't want to undress either.
You don't look well, Florina. Are you really sure nobody forced you to be here?
Florina is being attacked! Where is my spear? I'll strike this monster down!
You've lost again, Florina? Doesn't that mean you have to...
It's hard to see a fellow Pegasus Knight suffer like this. But you said it's for your own good, didn't you?
Oh! The woman that looks like an assassin has the worst hand?
That woman's looking at me..! I didn't stare at her. I'm facing a totally different direction.
Bless...
Even a lady like you has to strip, Lyn. But somehow, I doubt you have a problem with that.
Show us why you won the first popularity event in Askr!
If I had a body like yours, I'd be proud to show it, Lady Lyndis.
Why do I have the feeling I'm going to be jealous in a few seconds?
You're a soldier, Ping? You're pretty lightly-built... Oh, I know! You're a Pegasus Knight too, aren't you?
Why are you getting so flustered all of a sudden, Ping? Weren't you all manly and stuff just a moment ago?
Everyone is looking at this strange ball of light? Is something about to happen?
Sorry, but I know how to deal with hot blooded princesses.
Rinkah reminds me of Princess Minerva. Hopefully they don't share the same habits when losing...
Take your time Princess Minerv... I mean Rinkah! How could I mix them up?
Show us what the Fire Tribe is made of! ...Literally.
So you're a princess of the Fire Tribe, Rinkah? How should I address you? Princess Rinkah? Your Highness?
S-Sheena! Your panties! Where are your panties?
Shimakaze's under attack!? But where are the attacks coming from? Is there a ballista somewhere?
You can't fool me this time, Shimakaze! I know you're just pretending to be attacked!
Those ears... This is no spring outfit you're wearing, is it?
What's wrong, ~name~? Why are you fiddling with your clothing? Are you too hot?
Who won? Huh? Only the worst hand matters?
Who won this round? ...A tie? I don't quite get it, but we continue as if nothing happened, right?
Somehow, it feels different with men...
I'll never get used to men undressing in front of me. Even though I've already seen most of the Altean army`s men do it...
Est always covers her eyes when someone is undressing. She's so cute. Even though she's peeping through her fingers.
He looks like he is traumatized. I wonder how many humiliations his wife's put him through?
So it's the male one who has to strip?
Maybe you should have started with your gloves. They're a lot smaller than your cape.
I can't watch this! P-please take your time, Your Highness!
(Why does this boy have wings? His dad isn't a pegasus, is he?)
(Those wings reminded me: I read about an ancient race named Laguz. They had white wings on their back as well.)
S-strip poker!? Was I tricked by Palla again?
I don't see any difference. Did you even take anything off?
Mnn... Hard to tell what you just took off. Can you give me a hint?
Don't forget to pick up your ~clothing~ later.
Let's see... Could it be you took off your ~clothing~?
You didn't know either, Natsuki? What kind of place is this, where innocent girls get tricked into playing strip poker?
I mean, Princess Minerva can be mean too, but she has always stopped when I've reached my limit.
I'm confused too, Corrin...
On the other hand they reveal more skin than your cape did.
Your hands look more feminine than mine. Are they manicured?
(No! I have to stop thinking about this! Man, I just got a weird image in my head...)|
(So this would make him a... Heron? I can hardly believe this... I should just ignore his wings. Playing with men is already hard enough...)
Sorry, ~player~! Seems like I was set up by my sisters again... Don't worry! I won't leave.
Why do my sisters always want me to get involved with men other than him?
Wait... this is strip poker!? Did you know that, ~player~? ...You all knew!?
What should I do..?
I don't watch people undressing because I don't like being watched myself. That's only natural, isn't it?
Accessories are currently very popular in Askr.
Is that one of those accessories a summoner gives you?
The summoner in Askr wanted to give me a fancy accessory too, but I don't really like such stuff...
Pit has a bow!? Does that mean he's an archer? I have to be cautios!
Pit has a bow!? Does that mean he's an archer? I have to be cautious!
It is a good thing, Pit. Bows are very dangerous. Especially if there's a flyer in your group...
You have a bow with you? Oh! It's that kind of bow...
Your hairband? Good choice, Corrin!
I saw a combat dress similar to yours when I was summoned to Askr. A young lady named Lissa had one a lot like that!
That's the attitude! A Pegasus Knight is not ashamed by taken off her belt.
Hey! An honorable Pegasus Knight never runs away!
Hey! Running away will solve nothing, Florina!
Is something wrong with you belt, Florina?
That's a nice belt, Florina. But why do you take it off. Is it too tight?
She's running away!? Did I say something wrong?
She's leaving? And why did she leave her belt?
Starting with the sword... Seems fair. I guess I'll do the same when the time comes.
So this is "fashionable" in your world? Well, I prefer my boots to be useful rather than fashionable.
Seems like your staff's out of power... why didn't you check how many uses it had left before you came? That's one of the basics!
Huh? The aggressive woman's gone? And where did that girl come from..?
Hey, somebody should have told me that you can change places with someone during a round. I want to switch with one of my sisters!
Do you need help? I have experience with high boots like that.
You can strip of your weapon instead of a piece of clothing? I should keep that in mind
Your status won't help you to keep your gloves.
Princess Minerva always says weapon and weapon belt must be stripped off together...
This is already your 4th loss and you're still not taking off anything important? I don't know what Princess Minerva would say to that...
Maybe I should let my hair grow long too. Just to wear tons of accessories in it...
Oh, I know what that is! I saw the sages wearing glasses like that when they were studying books in the library.
There aren't any pegasi in your world? But Princess Minerva said all the girlishly-built men in the army have to become Pegasus Knights.
She's finally dropping her weapons...
I've expected you would start with your gloves.
Those boots don't look very comfortable. I doubt I could even walk in them.
A hot-blooded princess with tanned skin and an extra protection on her hips... Could it be you are my complete opposite?
Y-you're an assassin, Sheena? You don't look as gloomy as the ones I saw in Askr.
You said you're a summoner, Sheena? If I give you five Orbs, could you try to summon Prince Marth for me? You'll have to take a red sphere.
Ah! Shimakaze is burning! Was she hit by a fire arrow?
Oh, I see! That was also part of her act, wasn't it? Silly me...
Letting someone destroy unwanted accessories is actually a good idea. Maybe I should try it if somebody forces me into that bunny outfit again...
S-strip poker!? Was I tricked by Palla again?
I can hold your ~clothing~ for you if you want me to.
I doubt my sisters brought me here to see that...
If I'd tried that with Princess Minerva, she'd have spanked me. My butt still hurts from back then...
What did you take off again? I don't see any difference from before.
You didn't know either, Natsuki? What kind of place is this, where innocent girls get tricked into playing strip poker?
I have a lot of space inside my bags as well. I can carry two spears, a sword and up to five vulneraries inside it. Impressed?
How sweet! I've read a legend of an ancient race named Laguz. I saw they had cat ears too.
But without it you remind me a little bit more of your male counterpart. Maybe you should have kept it after all...
But without her hairband it's even harder to tell them apart... She should have kept it.
Now that I think about it, wasn't she something like a princess as well?
A Pegasus Knight can overcome every hurdle.
Being embarrassed is one thing, but at least you knew what you were getting into...
Be glad we're not playing with Princess Minerva. I can't even imagine what she would have done if someone had tried to escape.
...Just wait a moment! We didn't bet any money and she took her belt off, so... This isn't strip poker, is it? ...It is!? Nobody told me!
But didn't Princess Minerva say that a sword always has to come off with something else?
But boots beside, your outfit isn't very protective to begin with, is it?
Wait, you're a princess!? ...Now that you mention it, Princess Eirika mentioned an eccentric Princess named ~name~ more than once... I didn't realize it was you!
At least she's dropping her weapon. I can feel at ease now...
Prince Marth turned into a girl!! ...Wait, is that you, Lucina?
On second thought, I think you can undress by yourself. If my sisters heard that I offered to help you undress, bad rumors would start spreading...
Your hands are beautiful. How do you care for your skin?
But it was nice to see the legendary Mani Katti in person. Thanks for that, Lyn!
This must be a privilege of a real lady, huh?
Even her feet are beautiful. And she certainly walks a lot more than I do...
You're not hiding any more accessories on your body, do you, Landy Lyndis?
But isn't the lens missing? How can you even see through it?
Huh? You're done already? I thought it would take longer to strip your ~clothing~.
Ah! Sorry, Ping! I didn't mean to offend you. You're definitely a man. You don't have to keep reminding us...
Now she's just holding her weapons the whole time!? I have to be cautious!
Now I can relax a little. I really should have asked Princess Minerva for Iote's Shield.
Your wardrobe wouldn't have allowed another save start, to be honest...
But I think they suit you, Rinkah. ...I mean they did.
But no matter how different we are, Rinkah, we have to strip if we lose. That's the rule.
What a relief that you aren't a real assassin... But to be honest, you don't look like the summoners I met, either.
Oh... really? I just thought that way, I could get my own personal... Well, never mind. My sisters wouldn't let me keep him anyway.
That was just a fancy way to undress? Isn't that dangerous?
That was stripping? Does this mean this is strip poker!? I never knew... And don't set me on fire, please...
But fliers always have to be cautious. A ballista is no laughing matter...
Wait! Does this mean someone will shoot at me too!? I changed my mind! I'll wear my spring outfit with pride next year!
Sorry, ~player~! Seems like I was set up by my sisters again... Don't worry! I won't leave.
Why do my sisters always want me to get involved with men other than him?
Why hasn't Palla told me? This is no different than the poker nights with Princess Minerva.
Wait... this is strip poker!? Did you know that, ~player~? ...You all knew!?
I'm kind of nervous... Can you tell me when ~name~ is done?
J-just tell me when you're done.
Should I take a peek? Maybe not.
Your pants!? You can't be serious!
Why isn't Corrin undressing? She has lost, hasn't she?
Come to think of it: Isn't Corrin already naked? Why does she have to strip again?
S-strip poker!? Was I tricked by Palla again?
Playing with men is actually pretty much fun. If only he were here...
Oh, I know! You have removed your ~clothing~. Even though I wasn't watching.
Did my sisters bring me here because they want me to think of men other than him..?
You didn't know either, Natsuki? What kind of place is this, where innocent girls get tricked into playing strip poker?
What a relief you're wearing leggings under your pants. ...Wait, you're wearing leggings?
Ah! The male Corrin stripped his pants!? I was watching the wrong Corrin!
Sorry, ~player~! Seems like I was set up by my sisters again... Don't worry! I won't leave.
Why do my sisters always want me to get involved with men other than him?
Wait... this is strip poker!? Did you know that, ~player~? ...You all knew!?
J-just tell me when you're done.
I hope she takes off something good.
The others make me curious, but I keep up my policy. I won't watch until ~name~ is done.
Why is ~name~ taking so long? This suspense is killing me.
Wait! You are really a girl!? You're not crossdressing?
Wait! Corrin is a girl!? B-but you looked so manly in Askr...
Wait, Corrin! You're a girl!? And... we're playing strip poker!?
Oh! She's just firing at herself again...
Ah! I should have known she'd do that again...
Is it a good or a bad thing that she's only firing at herself?
You don't have to worry! As long as I'm here, all pegasi are safe!
...Oh, the female Corrin has lost.
Take your time! My armor takes a while to get off as well. And it's not as half as big as yours.
Your armors look quite similar too. Maybe it's easier to take them apart when one of then isn't wearing it.
Please tell me you won't be topless too after stripping your armor...
You take off your armor even though you still have so many options? We run different strategies after all...
Your armor? Well, your breastplate has no other purpose than protection, has it? Unlike mine...
Too bad you have to strip your gloves. I liked them. Can I try them on later?
Although your uniform is similar to mine, it's unique in its own way.
Isn't it hard to hold your balance, when you're raising your legs like this?
You're very flexible, Florina. I wouldn't be able to raise my legs that high without falling down...
Florina wears a tunic over a dress? Or is she wearing a dress under her tunic?
I can understand why you wear extra layers. It can be very cold in the skies. Lately it became very cold around my... Never mind!
Leave the girl alone, Lyn! She can undress herself...
Your tunic, Florina! It's after your tunic! Get out of it!
Those burns...
I still can't believe I confused her with Prince Marth... Maybe the distance between us is bigger than I want to admit...
I just realized how similar our armor looks. So are you a warrior as well? What class are you?
So you're finally parting with your sword? Thank goodness...
What is that woman doing with her!?
What!? Was she actually hit that time?
S-strip poker!? Was I tricked by Palla again?
Oh! You're without your ~clothing~ now.
I won't complain. It takes courage to take off your ~clothing~.
Incredible! Truly!
Good choice! I would have stripped my ~clothing~ too if I were you.
You didn't know either, Natsuki? What kind of place is this, where innocent girls get tricked into playing strip poker?
Sorry! I didn't know Corrin had a sister as well...
Now I remember. I've heard soldiers talking about a female Corrin in Askr. But we never formed a party together...
That's definitely one surprise too much... It's like my life has been a total lie so far.
Pegasus Knights are sensitive to ranged weapons being fired nearby! Please consider my nerves!
When fighting an opponent with a distance weapon you should either increase or decrease distance... What should I do?
For the record: I wasn't spacing out, I was just looking at the wrong person...
Big armor reveals a lot more when taken off. That must be... fate?
Why did I even worry? She's a girl after all. Don't let them confuse you, Catria!
Oh! Your hair's all messy... But why does it look that cute? I never look that cute when I'm unkempt...
Pegasus Knights all wear light armor. If we were in full armor no pegasus could even lift off.
I have a good feeling, you won't need it around here.
Would asymmetrical gloves suit me too?
You're doing great! Even if that was no big deal.
A-are you okay?
If you needed help, you could have said something. Pegasus Knights ought to help each other.
Your dress is beautiful, though. Is it self-made?
Such a cute dress wouldn't suit me anyway...
You should learn to be more independent, Florina!
Did it let you go? How fortunate you're wearing a dress under your tunic...
I've seen people burned by dragon fire. It looked really painful.
But now it shouldn't bother me anymore! From now on, I'll focus on the game.
I was kinda hoping it was your armor making you look that big... But you don't need tricks like that, do you?
Ah! It's not like I was scared when you swung it around like that. I just don't think swords suit a lady like you...
